shortdesc.ph: Sets parameters for SDK preset voice beautifier effects.

section.title: Detailed Description
section.p: Call this method to set a gender characteristic and a reverberation effect for the singing beautifier effect. This method sets parameters for the local user who sends an audio stream. After setting parameters, all users in the channel can hear the relevant effect.
To get better vocal effects, Agora recommends that you set scenario to (3) and set profile to (4) or (5) before calling this method.

ul.li: You can call this method either before or after joining a channel.
Do not set the profile parameter of to (1) or (6), otherwise the method will not take effect.
This method works best with the human voice. Agora does not recommend using this method for audio containing music.
After calling this method, Agora recommends not calling the following methods, because they can override \ref IRtcEngine::setVoiceBeautifierPreset "setVoiceBeautifierPreset":

plentry.pd:
Sets an SDK preset audio effect.
`SINGING_BEAUTIFIER`: Singing beautifier effect.

Gender characteristics of singing:
`1`: A male-sounding voice.
`2`: A female-sounding voice.

The reverberation effect of singing:
`1`: The reverberation effect sounds like singing in a small room.
`2`: The reverberation effect sounds like singing in a large room.
`3`: The reverberation effect sounds like singing in a hall.
